column4: I have a 80GB hard drive 30 GB  is devided between hda1 and swap space,,, I have 50 GB free space but cannot seem to create afat32  partiton using qtparted ,some error about device busy and possible data corruption,,, I assumued it would be possible to create a partiton whilst logged......any ideas as to how I can create this partition?
I even created a partiton using ranish partition manager from a boot cd but it wont show in qtparted just says the space is free :(
you shouldn't partition a mounted drive. you could use something like this http://gparted.sourceforge.net/livecd.php
I used Ultimate boot disk to create partiton (live CD) but still it does not show in disk manager, just reports it as free space
